word:
Jesus assured his disciples that he would in no case forsake them, but would be clothed with power, and would become their Advocate at the right hand of the Father, to present the petitions they might ask in the name of his Son. The disciples did not then fully comprehend the 
                                                                           12
words of their Master, but later in their religious experience they cherished the precious promise, and presented their prayers to the Father in the name of Jesus.
